Sitecore_AppName.Description: The name of the site to be deployed to.

Sitecore_AdminPassword.Description: The admin password for the Sitecore instance.

Packages_TempLocation.Description: Alternative location to save WDP packages. If left on the default $Env:Temp will be used.

Packages_DownloadLocations.Description: File with URI and SHA256 hashes of dynamically downloadable WDPs.
